title: What is the Munich tennis schedule?
description: The BMW Open by Bitpanda continues Wednesday in Munich. Two-time champion and top seed Alexander Zverev faces countryman Daniel Altmaier. American Ben Shelton is also in action. Munich

View the full Wednesday order of play for Munich

April 15, 2025

BMW Open by Bitpanda

The BMW Open by Bitpanda is now an ATP 500 event. By ATP Staff

The BMW Open by Bitpanda continues Wednesday in Munich. Two-time champion and top seed Alexander Zverev faces countryman Daniel Altmaier. American Ben Shelton is also in action.

View Wednesday's full order of play below (how to watch). 

You May Also Like: Can Zverev cap Munich hat-trick on event's ATP 500 debut?

ORDER OF PLAY - WEDNESDAY, 16 APRIL 2025
Center Court - start 11:00
Luciano Darderi (ITA) vs Miomir Kecmanovic (SRB)
[LL] Botic van de Zandschulp (NED) vs [2] Ben Shelton (USA)
[1] Alexander Zverev (GER) vs [WC] Daniel Altmaier (GER)
Tallon Griekspoor (NED) vs [WC] Yannick Hanfmann (GER)

Court 1 - start 11:00
[Q] Justin Engel (GER) / Max Hans Rehberg (GER) vs [2] Marcel Granollers (ESP) / Horacio Zeballos (ARG)
[1] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) vs Yuki Bhambri (IND) / Robert Galloway (USA)
[WC] Jakob Schnaitter (GER) / Mark Wallner (GER) vs Rafael Matos (BRA) / Marcelo Melo (BRA)

Not Before 17:00
[Alt] Guido Andreozzi (ARG) / Theo Arribage (FRA) vs [3] Christian Harrison (USA) / Evan King (USA)
